actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for income tax purposes of expenses incurred by an individual for transportation to and from work.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction to an individual for expenses incurred in commuting to and from work. Limits such deduction to $500 for each individual's expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for income tax purposes of expenses incurred by an individual for transportation to and from work.
